Articles.Content: Hey guys so I've been trying to play KSP on and off for a while. I never really understand what I'm doing because I could never do the training. Anytime I click on the training tab on the main menu it does literally nothing. I'm asking if you guys have any idea what I should do or if someone has the training files I could get in case mine are corrupt. I didn't buy the game from steam so I cant get support from them. I know I can watch tutorial videos or find it on the forums but I want the basic training  that the game gives you. Most other tutorials out of game give too much information when I want to learn this game on my own. Thank you!

Training is stored in saves/training:

Spoiler

A_VesselConstruction.sfs
B_flightBasics.sfs
B_fmidEditor.sfs
B_fsuborbital.sfs
B_gadvancedConstr.sfs
B_goForOrbit.sfs
C_Orbit101.sfs
D_Science.sfs
E_MunFlight1.sfs
F_MunFlight2.sfs
F_MunFlight3.sfs
G_Docking.sfs
I_Asteroid1.sfs
J_Asteroid2.sfs
banners

Maybe you cleared old saves too vigorously? Steam repair should refetch them.

10 hours ago, Chr1s7ian said:

Most other tutorials out of game give too much information when I want to learn this game on my own.

This is not THAT kind of game. Unless you have a degree in orbital mechanics, get any information you can. Seriously.
